mapper.sql: id, openid, unionid, nickName, avatarUrl, gender, city, province, country, phoneNumber, purePhoneNumber, countryCode, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE bas_user
openid = #{map.openid},
unionid = #{map.unionid},
nickName = #{map.nickName},
avatarUrl = #{map.avatarUrl},
gender = #{map.gender},
city = #{map.city},
province = #{map.province},
country = #{map.country},
phoneNumber = #{map.phoneNumber},
purePhoneNumber = #{map.purePhoneNumber},
countryCode = #{map.countryCode},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_user
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND openid like CONCAT('%', #{openid} , '%')
AND unionid like CONCAT('%', #{unionid} , '%')
AND nickName like CONCAT('%', #{nickName} , '%')
AND avatarUrl like CONCAT('%', #{avatarUrl} , '%')
AND gender like CONCAT('%', #{gender} , '%')
AND city like CONCAT('%', #{city} , '%')
AND province like CONCAT('%', #{province} , '%')
AND country like CONCAT('%', #{country} , '%')
AND phoneNumber like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNumber} , '%')
AND purePhoneNumber like CONCAT('%', #{purePhoneNumber} , '%')
AND countryCode like CONCAT('%', #{countryCode} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
